Basalt Golem can't be blocked by artifact creatures.

You may play Lightning Reflexes any time you could play an instant. If it was played any time a sorcery couldn't have been played, it gains substance until end of turn and when it loses substance, sacrifice it.
Enchant creature
Enchanted creature gets +1/+0 and has first strike.

mc.name: Pyric Salamander
mc.oracleText: {R}: Pyric Salamander gets +1/+0 until end of turn. Sacrifice Pyric Salamander at end of turn.

mc.name: Raging Spirit
mc.oracleText: {2}: Raging Spirit becomes colorless until end of turn.

mc.name: Reign of Chaos
mc.oracleText: Choose one - Destroy target Plains and target white creature; or destroy target Island and target blue creature.

mc.name: Searing Spear Askari
mc.oracleText:
Flanking (Whenever a creature without flanking blocks this creature, the blocking creature gets -1/-1 until end of turn.)
{1}{R}: Searing Spear Askari can't be blocked except by two or more creatures this turn.

mc.name: Sirocco
mc.oracleText: Target player reveals his or her hand. For each blue instant card revealed, he or she pays 4 life or discards that card.

mc.name: Subterranean Spirit
mc.oracleText:
Protection from red
{T}: Subterranean Spirit deals 1 damage to each creature without flying.

mc.name: Telim'Tor
mc.oracleText:
Flanking (Whenever a creature without flanking blocks this creature, the blocking creature gets -1/-1 until end of turn.)
Whenever Telim'Tor attacks, all attacking creatures with flanking get +1/+1 until end of turn.

mc.name: Telim'Tor's Edict
mc.oracleText:
Remove target permanent you own or control from the game.

Draw a card at the beginning of the next turn's upkeep.

mc.name: Torrent of Lava
mc.oracleText: Each player may tap any number of untapped creatures he or she controls. Torrent of Lava deals X damage to each creature without flying not tapped this way. Torrent of Lava deals X-1 damage to each creature without flying tapped this way.

mc.name: Zirilan of the Claw
mc.oracleText: {1}{R}{R}, {T}: Search your library for a Dragon permanent card and put that card into play. Then shuffle your library. That Dragon gains haste until end of turn. At end of turn, remove it from the game.

mc.name: Afterlife
mc.oracleText: Destroy target creature. It can't be regenerated. Its controller puts a 1/1 white Spirit creature token with flying into play.

mc.name: Alarum
mc.oracleText: Untap target nonattacking creature. It gets +1/+3 until end of turn.

mc.name: Auspicious Ancestor
mc.oracleText:
When Auspicious Ancestor is put into a graveyard from play, you gain 3 life.
Whenever a player plays a white spell, you may pay {1}. If you do, you gain 1 life.

mc.name: Benevolent Unicorn
mc.oracleText: If a spell would deal damage to a creature or player, it deals that much damage minus 1 to that creature or player instead.

mc.name: Civic Guildmage
mc.oracleText:
{G}, {T}: Target creature gets +0/+1 until end of turn.
{U}, {T}: Put target creature you control on top of its owner's library.

mc.name: Dazzling Beauty
mc.oracleText:
Play Dazzling Beauty only during the declare blockers step.
Target attacking unblocked creature becomes blocked.
Draw a card at the beginning of the next turn's upkeep.

mc.name: Disempower
mc.oracleText: Put target artifact or enchantment on top of its owner's library.

mc.name: Divine Retribution
mc.oracleText: Divine Retribution deals damage to target attacking creature equal to the number of attacking creatures.

mc.name: Favorable Destiny
mc.oracleText:
Enchant creature
Enchanted creature gets +1/+2 as long as it's white.
Enchanted creature has shroud as long as its controller controls another creature. (It can't be the target of spells or abilities.)

mc.name: Femeref Healer
mc.oracleText: {T}: Prevent the next 1 damage that would be dealt to target creature or player this turn.

mc.name: Femeref Knight
mc.oracleText:
Flanking (Whenever a creature without flanking blocks this creature, the blocking creature gets -1/-1 until end of turn.)
{W}: Femeref Knight gains vigilance until end of turn.

mc.name: Illumination
mc.oracleText: Counter target artifact or enchantment spell. Its controller gains life equal to its converted mana cost.

mc.name: Iron Tusk Elephant
mc.oracleText: Trample

mc.name: Ivory Charm
mc.oracleText: Choose one - All creatures get -2/-0 until end of turn; or tap target creature; or prevent the next 1 damage that would be dealt to target creature or player this turn.

mc.name: Jabari's Influence
mc.oracleText:
Play Jabari's Influence only after combat.

Gain control of target nonartifact, nonblack creature that attacked you this turn and put a -1/-0 counter on it.

mc.name: Mangara's Blessing
mc.oracleText:
You gain 5 life.

When a spell or ability an opponent controls causes you to discard Mangara's Blessing from your hand, you gain 2 life, and you return Mangara's Blessing from your graveyard to your hand at end of turn.

mc.name: Mangara's Equity
mc.oracleText:
As Mangara's Equity comes into play, choose black or red.

At the beginning of your upkeep, sacrifice Mangara's Equity unless you pay {1}{W}.

Whenever a creature of the chosen color deals damage to you or a white creature you control, Mangara's Equity deals X damage to that creature, where X is equal to the damage dealt to you or the white creature.

mc.name: Melesse Spirit
mc.oracleText: Flying, protection from black

mc.name: Mtenda Griffin
mc.oracleText:
Flying

{W}, {T}: Return Mtenda Griffin to its owner's hand and return target Griffin card in your graveyard to your hand. Play this ability only during your upkeep.

mc.name: Noble Elephant
mc.oracleText: Banding, trample

mc.name: Null Chamber

As Null Chamber comes into play, you and an opponent each name a card other than a basic land card.
The named cards can't be played.

mc.name: Prismatic Circle
mc.oracleText:
Cumulative upkeep {1} (At the beginning of your upkeep, put an age counter on this permanent, then sacrifice it unless you pay its upkeep cost for each age counter on it.)
As Prismatic Circle comes into play, choose a color.
{1}: The next time a source of your choice of the chosen color would deal damage to you this turn, prevent that damage.

mc.name: Rashida Scalebane
mc.oracleText: {T}: Destroy target attacking or blocking Dragon. It can't be regenerated. You gain life equal to its power.

mc.name: Ritual of Steel

mc.name: Sacred Mesa
mc.oracleText:
At the beginning of your upkeep, sacrifice Sacred Mesa unless you sacrifice a Pegasus.
{1}{W}: Put a 1/1 white Pegasus creature token with flying into play.

mc.name: Shadowbane
mc.oracleText: The next time a source of your choice would deal damage to you or a creature you control this turn, prevent that damage. If damage from a black source is prevented this way, you gain life equal to the damage prevented this way.

mc.name: Sidar Jabari
mc.oracleText:
Flanking (Whenever a creature without flanking blocks this creature, the blocking creature gets -1/-1 until end of turn.)
Whenever Sidar Jabari attacks, tap target creature defending player controls.

mc.name: Soul Echo
mc.oracleText:
Soul Echo comes into play with X echo counters on it.
You don't lose the game for having 0 or less life.
At the beginning of your upkeep, sacrifice Soul Echo if there are no echo counters on it. Otherwise, an opponent may choose that for each 1 damage that would be dealt to you until your next upkeep, you remove 1 echo counter from Soul Echo instead.

mc.name: Spectral Guardian
mc.oracleText: Noncreature artifacts have shroud as long as Spectral Guardian is untapped. (They can't be the targets of spells or abilities.)

You may play Ward of Lights any time you could play an instant. If it was played any time a sorcery couldn't have been played, it gains substance until end of turn and when it loses substance, sacrifice it.

mc.name: Delirium
mc.oracleText:
Play Delirium only during an opponent's turn.
Tap target creature that player controls. That creature deals damage equal to its power to the player. Prevent all combat damage that would be dealt to and dealt by the creature this turn.

mc.name: Discordant Spirit

At the end of each turn, if it was an opponent's turn, put a +1/+1 counter on Discordant Spirit for each 1 damage dealt to you that turn.
At the end of your turn, remove all +1/+1 counters on Discordant Spirit.

Reach (This creature can block creatures with flying.)

mc.name: Kaervek's Purge
mc.oracleText: Destroy target creature with converted mana cost X. If that creature is put into a graveyard this way, Kaervek's Purge deals damage equal to the creature's power to the creature's controller.

Flying

{T}: Leering Gargoyle gets -2/+2 and loses flying until end of turn.

mc.name: Malignant Growth
mc.oracleText:
Cumulative upkeep {1}
At the beginning of your upkeep, put a growth counter on Malignant Growth.
At the beginning of each of your opponents' draw steps, that player draws a card for each growth counter on Malignant Growth, then Malignant Growth deals damage to the player equal to the number of cards he or she drew this way.

mc.name: Phyrexian Purge
mc.oracleText: Destroy any number of target creatures. You lose 3 life for each creature targeted this way.

mc.oracleText: X target creatures gain protection from the color of your choice until end of turn.

mc.name: Purgatory

Whenever a nontoken creature is put into your graveyard from play, remove that card from the game.

mc.oracleText: Radiant Essence gets +1/+2 as long as an opponent controls a black permanent.

mc.name: Reflect Damage
mc.oracleText: The next time a source of your choice would deal damage this turn, that damage is dealt to that source's controller instead.

mc.name: Reparations
mc.oracleText: Whenever an opponent plays a spell that targets you or a creature you control, you may draw a card.

mc.oracleText: You gain X+3 life.
